channel.title: Two handed weapons [317] [Medium]

item.title: Two handed weapons [317] [Medium]
item.dc:creator: @runemaker runemaker
item.description:
@runemaker wrote:

Hello Moparscapians (Is that a word, idk ill just go with it) out there! Right now I got a blank delta as a server and im trying to add a two handed custom godsword. I got threw the creation and adding the stats but then the part thats suppose to be easy of course has to mess it all up (I know right). Right now my Delta doesn’t have a single 2 handed item and when I went into Item.Java to look for the area to add it in and nothing exept it redirects the two handed items to a file that I can’t open.

Heres how it works in my Item.java
I have:
Amulets
Arrows
Body
Boots
Capes
Crackers
Helms
FullHelms
FullMask
Gloves
Hats
And then it goes to the two handed but it looks sooo diffrent then the others
Two Handed

public static boolean[] itemTwoHanded = new boolean[19999];

Full Helms

public static int fullHelm[] = {2679,2682,2685,2688,2691,2694,2697,2700,2703,2706,2709,2712,2715,2718,2721,2724,2727,2730,2733,2736,2739,7611,5574,1169, 3753, 4513, 4515, 3748, 7112, 7124, 7130, 7136, 7539, 6621, 6623, 7594, 6131, 6137, 6128, 9986, 7613, 9807, 4732, 9813, 1149, 4753, 6188, 4511, 4056, 4071, 4724, 2587, 2595, 2605, 9810, 2613, 2619, 2627, 3486, 6402, 6394, 7594, 4745, 4732, 5554, 4753, 7624, 7631, 2518, 2524, 2526};

And after that theres an area where

[code]try {
FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File(
“data/twohanded.dat”));
while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
if (c == 0)
itemTwoHanded[counter] = false;
else
itemTwoHanded[counter] = true;
counter++;
}
dataIn.close();
} catch (IOException e) {
System.out
.println(“Critical error while loading twohanded! Trace:”);
e.printStackTrace();
}

	counter = ;[/code]

And this is the file it goes too http://uppit.com/ljod1ymtijog/twohanded.dat , I can’t find any way to open it, Can anyone help? Thankies! -Andrew
